In my opinion, the kitchen is the heart of the home. It’s where we cook, gather, and, let’s be honest, where people always seem to hang out. If I had it my way, my kitchen would be 10 times bigger — but unless my landlord has surprise renovation plans (I’m open to it, Ro!), I’m stuck with what I’ve got.

The biggest challenge? Counter space. With limited room, I can’t have appliances cluttering every surface. That’s why I swear by compact, all-in-one gadgets that do the work of multiple appliances. Enter the De’Longhi Livenza Air Fry Convection Oven — a nine-in-one tool that air fries, bakes, toasts, and more, all while saving space. It’s a great option for small kitchens, allowing you to whip up meals any way you want while keeping your counters clutter-free. And the best part? It’s on sale right now at QVC! 

What Is the De’Longhi Livenza Air Fry Convection Oven?

If you want every cooking method at your fingertips — whether air frying, baking, broiling, or toasting — consider the De’Longhi Livenza Air Fry Convection Oven. This smart, space-saving appliance packs nine cooking functions into one sleek design, making it a perfect all-in-one solution for small kitchens.

Unlike traditional ovens that seem to take forever to preheat, this one is about 60% faster and uses convection heating for even cooking. It also comes with an air fry basket, bake pan, pizza pan, wire rack, and crumb tray to handle all your cooking needs. And if you’re wondering what its nine functions are? They include toast, pizza, bake, broil/grill, air fry, convection, cookies, keep warm, and reheat — meaning it can do everything from crisping up fries to easily proofing your dough!  

What QVC Reviewers Say

“We are starting to get used to our new toaster oven. We had our last DeLonghi Toaster Oven for over 15 years and the one before that at about the same time. I’m hoping this one will last as long. I love all of these options for convection and air frying. It cooks pizza perfectly on that cute pizza tray. We love that this one is smaller and won’t take up much space on our counter.” —ShopMom

“We’ve been able to replace our air fryer and toaster with this single appliance. It bakes pizza perfectly! (And helps to prevent having to turn on our main oven) food cooks well and evenly.” — jhefley

“I have used the Digital Convection Oven several times. It has far exceeded my expectations. Everything cooked so well and evenly, even my cornbread. It has been super easy to use and easy to clean.” — jaimieh12

If you’ve been on the fence about getting a multifunction kitchen appliance like the De’Longhi Livenza Air Fry Convection Oven, consider this your sign to go for it. And if you’re new to QVC, you can save $15 on your first order of $35 or more with code WELCOME15!
